entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
